title: Okay, but buggy with photos
comment: Overall not a bad app, but I had multiple problems taking image notes (photos). Not all the photos I took were saved as image notes, most of the ones that were saved as image notes, were not saved in my gallery on my phone to download separately. And the geotagging on the photos only worked for about 5 percent of the images. The rest got pinned to the beginning of the track. With these issues, this app is simply not useable for me. (used on a Moto X 2013 running Android 4.4.4)

title: Geopaparazzi
comment: Simply awesome app, you can load into it any kind of gis dataset. Thank you for this!

title: Great app,
comment: But always running consuming fully 7%  of my battery without even running. Can't afford this.

It doesn't drain battery when closed. But since it needds to log in background, one needs to close it with the exit button of the menu. Else it will keep tracking in background and indeed drain the battery.

title: Awesome but quite professional
comment: You should try this somewhat weird app if you gather some kind of data in field. However if you just collect house numbers for OSM consider some more simplier app. Also this app has configurable forms, see docs on website (forms not editable via app gui).

title: Read contacts?
comment: Why does this thing need my address book all of a sudden? Uninstalled
It was used to make the panic sms sending address simpler to choose.

title: GPS stays on
comment: Useless for me. Can't figure it out.

title: great application
comment: one of the best applications on the market that works as expected, a goon almost hijerked my phone while testing it because i was too engrossed to notice
